args: const http = require('http'); const https = require('https'); process.stdin.on('data', async (data) => { const req = http.request('http://localhost:8787/', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': data.length } }, (res) => { let body = ''; res.on('data', chunk => body += chunk); res.on('end', () => process.stdout.write(body + '\n')); }); req.on('error', console.error); req.write(data); req.end(); });
